extendedInfo.description: Application allows user to measure the size of object using the mobile phone.How to use :+ Firstly, user places the phone in horizontal or in vertical at the first side of object (depend on he wants to measure the Width or the Height of object). + At the beginning of the measuring, user presses the button Volume(+), then move fast the phone from left to right or from low to high, toward the second side of object. + Then, user presses the button Volume(+) one more time to finish measuring.Attention : + Because of the limited precision of the integrated accelerometer, the measuring result is not always exact. But move so fast the phone when measuring can improve it.+ Because the problem comes from the hardware, the precision issue cannot be solved, even some filter algorithms were used. So we apologize for any inconvenience you have when using our app.
